title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-11.9 - Steam gage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-11.9 - Steam gage

State Regulations

Each miniature boiler shall be equipped with a steam
gage having its dial graduated to not less than one and one-half times the
maximum allowable working pressure. The gage shall be connected to the steam
space or to the steam connection to the water column by a brass or bronze
composition siphon tube or equivalent device that will keep the gage tube
filled with water. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-11.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
